text: The Princess on a Pea () is a 1977 Russian fantasy movie directed by Boris Rytsarev and starring Irina Malysheva, Andrey Podoshian, Irina Yurevich, Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Alisa Freindlikh. == Other websites == * Category:1977 fantasy movies Category:Russian fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Boris Rytsarev
title: The Princess on a Pea
